creator: gpothier@free.fr
text:
When a document contains an image with size 0x0, it prevents displaying of the
whole document.

The following document doesn't display anything:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<svg contentScriptType="text/ecmascript" zoomAndPan="magnify"
xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" contentStyleType="text/css"
version="1.0" width="200.0mm" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid meet"
height="200.0mm" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" x="0mm" y="0mm">
	<rect width="100mm" x="10mm" height="50mm" y="10mm" style="fill: rgb(204, 204,
255); stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 1; "/>
	<image x="50mm" y="30mm" width="0.0" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"
xlink:href="file:Images/ag1.jpg" height="0.0" />
</svg>



But setting the image size to 1x1mm it works properly:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<svg contentScriptType="text/ecmascript" zoomAndPan="magnify"
xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" contentStyleType="text/css"
version="1.0" width="200.0mm" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid meet"
height="200.0mm" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" x="0mm" y="0mm">
	<rect width="100mm" x="10mm" height="50mm" y="10mm" style="fill: rgb(204, 204,
255); stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 1; "/>
	<image x="50mm" y="30mm" width="1.0" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"
xlink:href="file:Images/ag1.jpg" height="1.0" />
</svg>

creator: deweese@apache.org
text: This should be fixed in CVS.
